annotation: Means 'to work' not necessarily in in the fields or garden or 'to work as an occupation'

language: East Sumbanese, Umbu Ratu Nggai dialect

annotation: ultimately Mon-Khmer borrowing but reconstructs back to Proto-Chamic

language: Kadazan Dusun of Taginambur, Kota Belud, Sabah, Malaysia

annotation: Spend time, energy (as in working hard for a small reward) (Fth) [<]
Cultivate, especially by a working party (Fth)
Generally means 'to work' without any other specification
Move; (of a variety of jobs, such as household work) work, perform, do; be active, be industrious
PCL: possibly Japanese loan? <sigoto> but collected 1939 before J occupation.
WP: pawili, wili VLP: rema (e pepet)
The distinction between those two lexical items is not clear
